title: Question:
author: projectdevelopment
created_time: May 19, 2023, 04:46:35 AMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 07:25:11 PM by projectdevelopment
content: I'm from the Project Development Baunty Management Community. I want to run a bounty campaign with your project. Let me know if you're interested. I've preached a lot of bounty campaigns before. According to everyone, my medium of promotion is different, but everyone likes it. Also ask me any questions if you want to do more about a bounty campaign.Means Of Bounty :1. Twitter2.Facebook3.Telegram4.Instagram5.Discord6.Medium7.Reddit8.Article9.Tik Tok Video/ Youtube VideoSir do you want to launch the project ?? ðŸš€ðŸš€BTCBTCContact me?Telegram: https://t.me/ProjectDevelopment49Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100084009552547&mibextid=ZbWKwLWhatsApp: +8801701014552Email address: mdshojibulislam49@gmail.com

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: If you are a professional bounty manager, could you share with us some examples of well handled campaigns you managed in the past?You are brand new here, have no reputation, and I think that a Telegram + email account is not enough to convince anyone here to work with you, with all the due respect.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc2 on May 19, 2023, 10:22:45 AMIf you are a professional bounty manager, could you share with us some examples of well handled campaigns you managed in the past?You are brand new here, have no reputation, and I think that a Telegram + email account is not enough to convince anyone here to work with you, with all the due respect.If he is a professional manager, shouldn't he at least know how to spell that word correctly? "proffetional", really?Shouldn't a professional know where such posts should be placed?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: projectdevelopment on May 19, 2023, 04:46:35 AMI am bounty proffetional manager.Can I run a Bounty with your project?Sir do you want to launch the project?Contract Telegram: @Mobarok33Contract address: mdshojibulislam49@gmail.comYou introduced yourself wrongly, let your previous works speak for you and not your words, and since you made some mistakes in some words which indicates a lack of professionalism.also, you have old topic here ---->  I am bounty manager. and you have provided your services better than this topic.I advise you to lock this topic and pump the previous one.

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: Haha since this is turning into a feedback thread, you should consider making a personal website if you're in search of these sort of management jobs. Something that gives yourself a personal brand and has a portfolio of projects you've contributed to in the past. In today's time with all the no-code website builders out there, anyone who is a Freelancer or actively seeking work in a personal capacity online should have a personal website that they can share. It helps you stand out from the others.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on May 19, 2023, 10:35:18 AMIf he is a professional manager, shouldn't he at least know how to spell that word correctly? "proffetional", really?Shouldn't a professional know where such posts should be placed?You made me laugh, my friend, when you said this , that if the spelling is wrong and then you say that he is a professional bounty manager, it seems like it is embarrassing for the profession that the op has.Â  Â  Â Then it's also the wrong section because the op posted here, he should have posted in this section " Service " then he should have background experience also show here to trust him as his reference also as a bounty manager.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Your post shows how professional you are. you have not mentioned any bounty you managed before. It will better to create portfolio of your work so that client see your previous work before contacting. anyways if you really want to manage bounty then you should do some hardwork to start good business. first of all you should make some followers on Twitter page and bring some good community to telegram group. now you should also have a good conversation skill to talk with project marketing team. To find new projects you can check twitter or https://icodrops.com/ and then contact through their email or telegram. Quote from: examplens on May 19, 2023, 10:35:18 AMIf he is a professional manager, shouldn't he at least know how to spell that word correctly? "proffetional", really?Shouldn't a professional know where such posts should be placed?he even misspell bounty spelling which he wanted to provide service. Quote from: projectdevelopment on May 19, 2023, 04:46:35 AMI'm from the Project Development Baunty Management Community.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: If you're offering bounty management and you are an experienced one why can't you create a good title for your thread what's with the poll how do you connect it to what you're offering, and why create your topic here we have a service section for those who like to offer bounty management.If you cannot do this simple thing why would a project developer hire you, you seem to be naive and a newbie in bounty management because you don't know your way here in Bitcointalk, the project will end up mismanaged with how you handle your presentation.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: projectdevelopment on May 19, 2023, 04:46:35 AMI'm from the Project Development Baunty Management Community. I want to run a bounty campaign with your project. Let me know if you're interested. I've preached a lot of bounty campaigns before. According to everyone, my medium of promotion is different, but everyone likes it. Also ask me any questions if you want to do more about a bounty campaign.You have preached a lot of bounty campaigns, but you do not care to list any one of them here ? Why ? How would one know that you are speaking the truth and you really have that much experience?Also you said that according to everyone you promotion method is different, so can you care to tell that according to whom you are referring here ? Also you do not tell your unique promotion method ?I am afraid based on the details mentioned, you wont be able to get any bounty manager manager work here. Better be more professional and write your detailed experience.
